data.message: The "say thanks" videos are a great idea, but there's one problem. It only gives you certain pic from the persons profile and where it says "add photo" it goes to your files and it won't add them anyway. I wanted to make one for my daughter but the photos that it offers aren't the ones I want to use. How can that be changed, or can it be changed?

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Cayle! We don't currently offer that feature, but we'll take this back to our team. If you have anymore suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Ryan
Does it cost money like it cost money to boost my dad's page that is dead in memory of him?
